Description_lang: Your next 4 mana consuming spells or abilities will consume $322324s1% of your health instead of using mana. If you consume this potion while your weapon is augmented with Embalmer's Oil, the amount of health consumed is decreased by $s3%. Lasts 25 secs.Cannot be used above level $V.
AuraDescription_lang: Consume health instead of mana when casting spells and abilities.
